description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Forget Kings and Flip Cup - Drinkards is the sickest drinking game around! Supports up to 30-player parties, so grab some beer and start drawing from our huge deck of cards. They dictate who drinks via rules, pong toss, jumping, and more! Try to stay sober though, or you'll start failing the Sobriety Test - and lowest BAC wins!  Drink your night into a better mood with Drinkards - Responsibly.
